_components._string:
Terms of Service

Welcome to Igamesland.com.
You are reading the Terms of Service ("Terms"), which govern the relationship and act as an agreement between you and us and set out the terms and conditions on which you may access and use our websites, service and related content (collectively, the "Services"). For the purposes of these Terms, “you” and “your” mean that you are the user of the services from website Igamesland.com. The Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and us. Please take the time to read it carefully.
Your access to and use of the Services is subject to these Terms and all applicable laws and regulations. You may not access or use the Services if you are not fully able and legally competent to agree to these Terms.
If you are under the age of 16, you may use the Services only with the consent of your parent or legal guardian. Please ensure that your parent or legal guardian has reviewed and discussed these Terms with you.

Acceptance of the Terms
By accessing or using our Services, you confirm that you can enter-into a binding contract with Igamesland.com and that you accept these Terms and agree to comply with them. Your access to and use of our Services is also subject to any regulations on gaming industry in your jurisdiction. 

Changes to the Terms 
We modify these Terms from time to time, we will use commercially reasonable efforts to notify the users, for example through a notice on our website. However, you should check the Terms regularly to review such changes, we will also update the “Last Updated” date at the bottom of these Terms, which reflects the effective date of these Terms, your continued access to or use of the Services after the date of the new Terms constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, you must not use the Services.

Account Security 
To access or use our services, you must create an account with us. When creating this account, you must provide accurate information. 
It is important that you keep your account password confidential and not disclose it to others. 
You agree you are solely responsible for all the proper activities that occurs under your account regardless whether the activities are truly from you or not. If you know or suspect that any third party knows your password or has accessed your account, you can reset your password by receiving a password recovery link via your registered email address. 
We reserve the right to disable your user account at any time, including if you fail to comply with any provision of these Terms, or if activities occur on your account that, in our sole discretion, could or may damage or impair the Services or otherwise Violates the rights of others or violates any applicable laws or regulations.
If you no longer wish to use our services again, and would like to delete your account, please contact our customer service team via email. We will guide you the process. Once you choose to delete your account, you will not be able to reactivate your account or retrieve any content or information in your account.

Tracking Data
Igamesland.com keeps records of users’ behavior as they navigate through the website. This type of tracking is completely anonymous and used only to analyze the user journey. For example, the collection of data on which pages users are visiting and which areas of the site they spend the most time on.

In addition, Igamesland.com collects IP addresses, operating system details and web browser information. And, we also keep track of how users are finding us, so we can know what drives traffic to our site. All of these things are used for the sole purpose of optimizing our site and improving the overall user experience at Igamesland.com..

Intellectual Property Rights 

All content, software, images, text, graphics, illustrations, logos, patents, trademarks, service marks, images in the website are owned by igamesland.com. You may not download, copy, reproduce, distribute, transmit, broadcast, display, sell or otherwise exploit this content for any commercial purpose without the prior written consent of us or, where applicable, our licensors. 
As a condition of your access to and use of the Services, you agree to the terms of the Copyright Policy.

The Law
These Terms of Service and any separate agreements whereby we provide you Services shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong.

Contact
For questions, comments and requests related to this policy, you should go to the following contacts.
Email:CS@igamesland.com
